main event: A military UFO sighting was reported in Flagstaff, Arizona on May 3rd, 1958. The object was an elongated balloon-like shape, seen at an altitude of 35,000 feet. It was also picked up on radar, but due to interference, no radar contact was established.
interesting points: The object was described as an elongated, blimp-type white balloon, with a slow to medium speed across the sky.
The altitude of the object was estimated to be between 25,000 to 35,000 feet.
The sighting was witnessed by military personnel, including Captain Gary L. Woods and Lieutenant Mary L. Aldrich of the 31st Fighter Interceptor Squadron, U.S.A.F.
The object disappeared over the edge of visibility as it passed to the right of the aircraft.
The pilot and crew were not specially concentrated on the possibility of sighting unusual aerial phenomena at the time of the flight.
